item.description:
Holy Communion is a Sacrament that is purported to bring the recipient into a state of union with God. Have you ever wondered why millions of devotees worldwide line up daily to receive it? But how many of those participating truly come into union with the Holy offering that ritual brings? How many truly understand the mystery of Jesus' body and blood and allow themselves to be affected and changed by this most beautiful gift? What is a Sacrament, anyway? Whether you have never received communion or are a daily partaker, this seminar will open your understanding of the meaning and purpose of this rite initiated by the Master Jesus 2000 years ago. Come and find out for yourself why this most perfect gift is the way to perfection for your soul.

---------------------------------------------------
About the presenter

Father Peter Bowes has served as a Priest and Christian Master Teacher for over 20 years. Though he has had much other life experience, having owned a restaurant and a construction business, had a thriving psychotherapy practice, written three books on spirituality, been married for many years and raised two daughters, his primary focus in life has been his devotion to serving God and teaching others how to come into a real experience of God inside themselves. Currently, Father Peter serves as Co-Director of the Order of Christ/Sophia, teaching and ministering to his spiritual students, and guiding fifteen Centers of Light and their ministers around the country. He travels between these Centers year-round, teaching and lecturing, as well as performing his music as a singer-songwriter of Mystical Christian folk rock. Many of the elements of the Mystical Christian teachings can be heard and experienced in Father Peter's music, encouraging the listener to seek and discover the Truth within. Listen to his music on Sophia Radio. When not traveling, Father Peter lives at the Center of Light in Chicago, IL.
